data.text: @MrsCaliKas So would I.  Thank you for your kind words.  My hope is that the Biden Administration will get in and give the states the help they need.

@MrsCaliKas Michelle you are a lovely person.  I heard a doctor on the news state that they should stop holding the vaccines for second doses and just get as many ppl as possible vaccinated with the first dose.

@MrsCaliKas I'm sorry you're going through this Michelle.  I lost coworkers that actually worked in the warehouses , while I work at home. Maybe it's survivor's guilt. I want us all to be able to get it soon.  This mismanagement is unbelievable.
